text: But Ms. Dickinson said she had been advised by her publishers to leave out the assault for legal reasons. “ You take poetic license in what you do, ” she said. “ Today I am on a sworn Bible. ” Four other women have told the jury of being drugged and assaulted by Mr. Cosby. Ms. Dickinson, now 63, a reality TV celebrity, said she was working as a model in New York in 1982 when Mr. Cosby approached her through her agency and invited her to his Manhattan house to talk about acting. Soon afterward, she said Mr. Cosby flew her to Lake Tahoe where she watched him perform, and they had dinner and discussed her career. She said she went to his hotel room to continue their conversation, and there she snapped some pictures — which were shown to the courtroom — of
